::DrillBit::

DrillBit awoke, and noticed where he was, and that KitKat was gone. He
had just been through the greatest time he could remember. He went to
the sink, and splashed some water on his face. His optics finally
started working right. He went to the mess hall, grabed a few energon
cubes, a apple for his organics, and a glass of energin. He sat down and
started eating. When he was done he would find KitKat. They had to start
the training soon.
